mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NESTED_REPLY (NESTED_REPLY_ID, MEMBER_ID, REPLY_ID, NESTED_REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (NESTED_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{replyId}, #{nestedReplyContent})
